actions.text: Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 4755 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Measure will be considered read. Specified amendments are in order.
The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-590, by Mr. Linder.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 199.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 707.
The previous question was ordered without objection.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 223 - 194 (Roll no. 336).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4755) making appropriations for the Legislative Branch for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2005, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4755) making appropriations for the legislative branch for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2005.

titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4755) making appropriations for the Legislative Branch for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2005, and for other purposes.
